Class ImageHolder

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      ImageHolder

public class ImageHolder
extends greenfoot.Actor

Simple class that serves to be an Actor to display the image. (Revised 11/14 to avoid crashing if user cancels import operation).

Version:
November 2013, revised
Author:
Jordan Cohen

Constructor Detail

ImageHolder

public ImageHolder(java.lang.String fileName)
Construct an ImageHolder with a file name. If there is an error, show a blank GreenfootImage.

Parameters:
fileName - Name of image file to be displayed.

public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getBufferedImage()
Allows access to my awtImage - the backing data underneath the GreenfootImage class.

Returns:
BufferedImage returns the backing image for this Actor as an AwtImage

openFile

public boolean openFile(java.lang.String fileName)
Attempt to open a file and assign it as this Actor's image

Parameters:
fileName - Name of the image file to open (must be in this directory)
Returns:
